actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    t.TagName,
    t.TagAddress,
    t.TagDataType,
    t.TagAccessRight,
    d.DeviceName,
    dr.DriverName
FROM 
    Tag t
JOIN 
    Device d ON t.DeviceId = d.DeviceId
JOIN 
    Driver dr ON d.DriverId = dr.DriverId
JOIN 
    Projects p ON dr.ProjectId = p.ProjectId
WHERE 
    p.ProjectName = {{PrjSelect.selectedOptionValue}};
